description: Loxton-van der Poorten sequence: base 4 representation contains only -1, 0, +1.
references: N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
links: J.-P. Allouche and J. Shallit, The ring of k-regular sequences, Theoretical Computer Sci., 98 (1992), 163-197. [DOI]
J. H. Loxton and A. J. van der Poorten, Arithmetic properties of automata: regular sequences, J. Reine Angew. Math. 392 (1988), 57-69.
formula: Recurrence: a(3n) = 4a(n), a(3n-1) = 4a(n)-1, a(3n+1) = 4a(n)+1, starting 0,1. - _Ralf Stephan_, Jan 19 2014
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
extensions: Offset changed to 0 and example added by _Ralf Stephan_, Jan 19 2014
